A Good Band Name

API Documentation

You can use our endpoints for all your Bandname As A Service(BAAS) needs

To get a curated band name:

curl https://8o9iyd7q3e.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/curated

To get a random band name:

curl https://8o9iyd7q3e.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/random
